${ModID}:SummonBulldog.NAME: Summon Bulldog
${ModID}:SummonBulldog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:SummonVegetables.NAME: Summon Vegetables
${ModID}:SummonVegetables.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each attack played this turn, including this one.

${ModID}:SummonTrees.NAME: Summon Trees
${ModID}:SummonTrees.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Take !M! less damage from Attacks this turn.

${ModID}:SummonElephant.NAME: Summon Elephant
${ModID}:SummonElephant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Take !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SummonBees.NAME: Summon Bees
${ModID}:SummonBees.DESCRIPTION: Channel a ${ModID}:Swarm of Bees X times. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SummonBees.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a ${ModID}:Swarm of Bees X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SummonDisease.NAME: Summon Disease
${ModID}:SummonDisease.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SummonDemon.NAME: Summon Demon
${ModID}:SummonDemon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain Strength equal to its total cost.
${ModID}:SummonDemon.EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain Strength equal to its total cost + 1.

${ModID}:SummonPandas.NAME: Summon Pandas
${ModID}:SummonPandas.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel a !M! damage ${ModID}:Panda.
